mapper.insert: insert into teachers (name, password, subject) values (#{name}, #{password}, #{subject})
mapper.select: select tea_num teaNum, name, email, password, subject, profile_image profileImage from teachers
mapper.update: update teachers set email= #{email}, subject = #{subject} where tea_num like #{teaNum}
mapper.delete: delete from teachers where tea_num like #{teaNum}
